name: Iron tools pipeline
goal: Efficiently craft one full set of iron tools (one Iron Pickaxe, one Iron Axe, one ron Shovel, and one Iron Sword)
required_items: logs x3 minimum (any type: oak, spruce, birch, jungle, acacia, dark_oak, mangrove, cherry, pale_oak, bamboo, crimson, warped — produces 12 planks)
planks x12 total (5 for sticks, 4 for crafting table, 3 for wooden pickaxe)
sticks x5 total (for all tools and weapons)
cobblestone x11 minimum (8 for furnace, 3 for stone pickaxe)
iron_ore x9 (or raw_iron x9 — to smelt into 9 iron ingots)
iron_ingot x9 total (3 pickaxe + 2 sword + 1 shovel + 3 axe)
fuel for smelting 9 iron ore (2 coal/charcoal smelts 16 items)
crafting_checklist: craftWoodenPickaxe: 3 planks + 2 sticks -> wooden_pickaxe (to mine stone/obtain cobblestone)
craftStonePickaxe: 3 cobblestone + 2 sticks -> stone_pickaxe (to mine iron ore)
craftFurnace: 8 cobblestone -> furnace (to smelt iron ore)
environment: Track perceived fuel sources like logs or coal
Note nearby furnaces or crafting tables; craft them if missing
Cobblestone can be obtained by mining stone blocks with any pickaxe
Avoid mining directly above/below to stay safe
A stone pickaxe is the MINIMUM tool needed to mine iron ore — wooden pickaxes CANNOT mine iron

steps.title: Survey resources and inventory
steps.details: Check inventory for existing tools, planks, sticks, cobblestone, and iron. Check nearby blocks for logs, stone, iron ore, coal ore, furnaces, and crafting tables. Plan which steps can be skipped based on what you already have.
checks: Note what tools you already have
Locate logs, stone, and ore in perception

steps.title: Gather wood (minimum 3 logs)
steps.details: Mine wood to get at least 3 logs. Any wood type works. 3 logs = 12 planks, which covers the 12 planks needed. If you already have planks/sticks, reduce this accordingly. See the 'Gather wood' recipe for all methods. Use an axe if available for faster chopping.
checks: Have at least 3 logs (or equivalent of 12 planks)

steps.title: Craft basic wooden pickaxe and crafting table
steps.details: Craft 12 planks from logs, then 6 sticks from planks. Craft a crafting table (4 planks). Craft a wooden pickaxe (3 planks + 2 sticks). The wooden pickaxe lets you mine stone/cobblestone. See micro-recipes: craftPlanks, craftStick, craftCraftingTable, craftWoodenPickaxe.
checks: Have crafting_table placed or in inventory

steps.title: Mine cobblestone (minimum 11 blocks)
steps.details: Mine stone with your wooden pickaxe to get cobblestone. You need 11 minimum: 8 for furnace + 3 for stone pickaxe.

steps.title: Craft stone pickaxe and furnace
steps.details: Craft a furnace (8 cobblestone). Craft stone pickaxe (3 cobblestone + 2 sticks) — REQUIRED to mine iron ore. Place the furnace. See micro-recipes for each.
checks: Have stone_pickaxe equipped — this is CRITICAL for mining iron

steps.title: Acquire fuel for smelting
steps.details: You need enough fuel to smelt 9 iron ore. Options: mine coal ore (each coal smelts 8 items, so 2 coal covers 9 smelts). Or smelt logs into charcoal (each charcoal smelts 8 items). Or use planks/logs directly as fuel (each smelts 1.5 items — very inefficient).
checks: Have at least 6 coal/charcoal for 9 smelts
Keep spare wood for sticks — do not burn all your wood

steps.title: Mine iron ore (9 blocks)
steps.details: Locate iron ore using perception. Mine with your STONE PICKAXE or better. You need 9 iron ore to produce all items. It drops raw_iron.
checks: Have 9 raw_iron or iron_ore in inventory

steps.title: Smelt iron ingots
steps.details: Place raw_iron in the top slot of the furnace and fuel in the bottom slot. Smelt all 9 raw_iron into 9 iron_ingot.

steps.title: Craft all iron tools
steps.details: Using the crafting table, craft in this priority order: 1) iron_pickaxe (3 ingots + 2 sticks), 2) iron_sword (2 ingots + 1 stick), 3) iron_axe (3 ingots + 2 sticks), 4) iron_shovel (1 ingot + 2 sticks). Total: 9 iron ingots + 7 sticks. See individual micro-recipes for each item's crafting layout.

steps.title: Equip tools
steps.details: Equip iron pickaxe. Verify all 4 items were crafted successfully by checking inventory. The Iron Tools Pipeline is complete when you have: iron_pickaxe, iron_sword, iron_shovel, iron_axe.

notes: If coal is missing, produce charcoal by gathering extra logs to smelt in a furnace (use planks as initial fuel — 2 planks smelt 1 log into 1 charcoal, then that charcoal smelts 8 more items). Keep spare blocks for emergency towers or walls. If iron is scarce, prioritize: stone_pickaxe -> iron_pickaxe -> iron_sword. Multiple furnaces running in parallel dramatically reduce smelting time.
